LanguageData.Leather_ForgingDragon.label: loong scale
LanguageData.Leather_ForgingDragon.description: The soft scale of loong, can be used as a leathery material.
LanguageData.Meat_ForgingDragon.label: loong meat
LanguageData.Meat_ForgingDragon.description: The flesh and meat of loong, a terrifying sight on the dining table.
LanguageData.NY_BloodEssence.label: blood essence
LanguageData.NY_BloodEssence.description: The essence of life, can be used in miraculous crafts.
LanguageData.NY_GreenGlaze.label: green glaze
LanguageData.NY_GreenGlaze.description: An decorative material created by heating jade in a klin. Vibrant in color and transparet in texture, this material is prized among loongs.
LanguageData.NY_ImmortalIron.label: immortalite
LanguageData.NY_ImmortalIron.description: An exotic metallic material, considered as top secret by loongs and used in their legendary weapons. This material requires specialized processing which seldom fits in other recipes.
LanguageData.NY_LotusRootSilk.label: lotus root silk
LanguageData.NY_LotusRootSilk.description: A white textile made from the fiber within lotus roots. It is strong and insulating against code and heat.\n\nLow production rate and high demand caused ancient loongs to turn every patch of ground into lotus fields, until the technique of blending cotton was invented.
LanguageData.NY_RedIron.label: bloodsteel
LanguageData.NY_RedIron.description: Steel infused with blood essence. It was said to be a bloodlust material and makes sharper blades.
LanguageData.NY_RefinedIron.label: refined steel
LanguageData.NY_RefinedIron.description: A refined material better than common steel.
